constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 58 (Monday, March 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PASCRELL:
H.R. 2286.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H1699]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat property transferred by gift or at death as sold for fair market value, and for other purposes.
